nodes.text: Ando was a water-covered planet in the Ando system of the Lambda sector, a sector in the galaxy's Mid Rim, located in grid square Q-15 on the Standard Galactic Grid, that was homeworld of the amphibious Aqualish species. At the time of the Trade Federation's Invasion of Naboo, it was a member of the Galactic Republic and was represented in the Galactic Senate by Senator Po Nudo. During the Separatist Crisis, turmoil occurred on Ando that left the galaxy staggered and it seceded from the Republic, joining the Confederacy of Independent Systems, which promised it the support of the InterGalactic Banking Clan and Techno Union. A type of wine known as Andoan wine was produced on Ando. It was the homeworld of Senator Po Nudo, the weapons manufacturer Amda Wabo, and the smuggler Ponda Baba.

Ando was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Star Wars Rebels: Head to Head, a 2014 young readers book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on August 26, 2014. It was originally created for Galaxy Guide 4, a 1989 roleplaying supplement by West End Games.
